name: B(eG)in
description:
Rules: Theres only 1 rule, SHOOT 'EM DOWN

This game has been made under 1 hour, further updates will come fairly soon, its a basic game with only 1 purpose, the genre is a F******* TIME WASTER MINI-GAME SHOOTER, cause why the hell not?

As its a 1 hour build the gui is not fit so to exit the game press CTRL ALT DELETE and task manager, or press windows button and press the "X" or F4.

This will run in Phone-like Graphics in 800x600 Windowed at 60 fps on any PC, until the 'EMs begin respawning too quickly.

They respawn every 1 second and 9 of them spawn at the same time, whoever mods the game perfectly enough will be able to get the secret ending ;)
